org.cast.cwm.glossary
Class Glossary

java.lang.Object
  org.cast.cwm.glossary.Glossary

public class Glossary
extends Object

This class encapsulates the notion of a Glossary. A glossary is a collection of entries (IGlossaryEntry objects). Enough information about them is stored in maps so that the common operations (running GlossaryTransformer, making a navigation list of glossary terms, etc) can be completed without accessing all of the individual glossary entries (which may require database queries, file access, etc).

getShortDefById

public String getShortDefById(String id)
Get the short definition of the entry with the given id. This does not attach the model of the entry so it can be efficiently used at any time.

Parameters:

normalizeHeadword

public String normalizeHeadword(String string)
Normalization function used by this glossary for headwords. Default implementation just cleans up whitespace.

Parameters:
extracted - headword
Returns:
headword that will actually be used.

normalizeTerm

public String normalizeTerm(String string)
Normalization function used by this glossary for terms. Default implementation forces lowercase, trims and normalizes whitespace.

Parameters:
string - the term to be normalized
Returns:
normalized version of the term

normalizeFirstChar

public char normalizeFirstChar(char firstChar)
Normalization function used by this Glossary for the first letters of words. Default implementation forces the character to uppercase.

Parameters:
a - character
Returns:
the normalized form of that character.
